name: Juniper
headline: Admin automation for behavioral health
description:
We’re on a mission to make behavioral health more available and accessible. We're backed by a16z, YCombinator, Craft, and many others to make this dream a reality.

At Juniper, we build software for behavioral health clinicians to improve quality of care. We streamline and replace manual efforts so clinicians can focus on what they do best: providing high-quality care.

—

Behavioral health is broken. We think this is a problem worth solving, and we think we know how to solve it. Interested? Check out https://jobs.lever.co/juniperplatform.

—

Want to say hi? Drop us a line at hello@juniperplatform.com.

founders.name: Nathan Lee, Founder
founders.description: Former McKinsey consultant (background in GTM/sales/PE). Harvard '19. Proud labradoodle puppy owner.

founders.name: Celina Qi, Founder
founders.description: Former health care consultant at McKinsey. Harvard '19. Aspiring home baker.

raw_markdown='# Insurance reimbursement in days, not months.
Achieve full financial confidence with automated billing and advanced payouts, **built specifically for therapy clinics.**
[ ABA/SLP/OT](https://www.juniperplatform.com/</bh-billing>)
[PT](https://www.juniperplatform.com/</pt-billing>)
[Get started today![Credentialing tips summary](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615f1c36c4f8a27f7e36eb3e_Right.svg)](https://www.juniperplatform.com/<#>)
[Get started today![Credentialing tips summary](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615f1c36c4f8a27f7e36eb3e_Right.svg)](https://www.juniperplatform.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615eb1f447aeb41aff409434_Vector%20\(53\).svg)
Integrated with:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615eb33cd90c5e1e1f2953e4_Group-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615eb33cf7cd382329b50081_Group.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615eb33c793bea0088d71cbd_Group-4.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615eb33c045c396a0bef818c_Group-2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615eb33d9a291dad2240f91f_Group-3.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615eb33d4285d0568281b24b_Vector.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615eb33b84b66fa4b7513d02_g4157_1_.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/6198208cdaa75478a941686d_hipaa.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615fff0159935384512d23dc_Group%2044%20\(2\)%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/64ca63956dc4e44b54178efe_data.svg)
## Payer Rules
>$750M of therapy claims data drives our treatment-specific rules engine
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615ec338f774a60d5bd59be3_Line%2011.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615ec338e016bc517d8da0bd_Group%2047.svg)
## Automation
Claims auto-scrubbed, validated, and submitted daily, accelerating payment
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615ec338f774a60d5bd59be3_Line%2011.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615ec3386627f5463a9479e0_Group%2034.svg)
## Tech Scale
Claim life cycle automation works at massive scale, enabling sustainable growth
## Purpose-built for therapy clinics.
### You need insurance billing that deeply understands your care.
We analyze millions of claims in ABA, SLP, OT, PT, mental health, and other therapies, giving treatment-specific billing rules
Instead of relying on hiring and retaining your own insurance billers with deep industry knowledge, our automation ensures complete accuracy and consistency of billing rules for every treatment code and insurance payer
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615eca78e3356c50e4a5f70c_Group%2048%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615ed22c337afc0534b0ce89_Group%2049%20\(2\).png)
### Best-in-class security protocols.
Proactive host intrusion monitoring and detection — scans deployed for both public and private-facing network of the master reference stacks
Security group firewalls — public-facing instances use inbound rules configured in denyall mode, with only necessary ports opened and regularly enforced
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615ed421f7cd386d93b5e255_Group%2028.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/615ed4213a198d49398c775b_Group%2050.svg)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/617997a87e24c922bb52e2c6_Vector.png)](https://www.juniperplatform.com/<#>)
Workflow tools for behavioral health providers.
[](https://www.juniperplatform.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/juniperplatform>)[](https://www.juniperplatform.com/<https:/www.facebook.com/juniperplatform>)[](https://www.juniperplatform.com/<https:/twitter.com/JuniperPlatform>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615ea25d6632c82c2b0e833d/61aa975845b19b28fbedfc9c_HIPAA%20Compliant%20Light%20\(1\).png)](https://www.juniperplatform.com/<https:/www.aptible.com/secured-by-aptible/?utm_campaign=secured-by-aptible&utm_content=${d5672dcb-e0c9-4c03-b40d-680c058a846e}>)
## Legal

generated_description:
Juniper is an innovative startup dedicated to transforming the landscape of behavioral health through admin automation. Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W21, the company is headquartered in New York and currently operates with a dynamic team of about 40 employees.

The core mission of Juniper is straightforward: they aim to make behavioral health more accessible and efficient by empowering clinicians with software solutions that streamline administrative tasks. The founders recognized that the field of behavioral health is plagued with inefficiencies—a sentiment echoed across the industry. As a response, Juniper is focused on developing tools that not only simplify billing processes but also enhance the overall quality of care provided to patients.

Key highlights of Juniper's offerings include:

1. **Automated Billing**: Juniper's platform ensures that insurance reimbursement processes happen in days instead of months, giving therapy clinics financial confidence through advanced payout strategies tailored specifically for various therapy types like ABA, SLP, OT, and PT.

2. **Data-Driven Insights**: Backed by a robust database of over $750 million in therapy claims, Juniper’s technology includes treatment-specific billing rules that take the guesswork out of insurance billing, improving accuracy and consistency.

3. **Workflow Efficiency**: By automating tasks like claims validation and submission, clinicians can redirect their efforts toward what really matters—providing high-quality care to their patients.

4. **Security and Compliance**: Juniper follows best-in-class security protocols and is committed to maintaining robust protection for user data, aligning with HIPAA standards to ensure privacy and security in healthcare.

5. **Community Engagement**: Juniper is actively involved with groups like the Council for Autism Service Providers, focusing on critical initiatives like Payor Rate Transparency for ABA providers.

The company is well-supported by powerful investors, including a16z and YCombinator, which enhances their capabilities to drive innovation in health tech. If you want to explore career opportunities or reach out, you can visit [Juniper's website](https://www.juniperplatform.com/) or contact them directly at hello@juniperplatform.com.

In summary, Juniper embodies the spirit of innovation in healthcare by addressing the pressing challenges faced by behavioral health providers. They are tackling a systemic problem in a meaningful way and have the backing and expertise to make a real difference in the field. If you're passionate about enhancing behavioral health systems, Juniper could be a great player to keep an eye on.
